CustomField.description:
E2B (R2): B.2.i.1.b, reactionmeddrallt (250AN)
E2B (R3): E.i.2.1b Reaction / Event (MedDRA code) Conformance: Required Data Type: 8N OID: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.163 Value Allowed: Numeric
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This data element captures the MedDRA LLT most closely corresponding to the reaction/event as reported by the primary source. In the exceptional circumstance when a MedDRA term cannot be found, the sender should use clinical judgment to complete this item
CustomField.label: Reaction/Event MedDRA Term (LLT)
